New Records: Bradley Barcola scored in the opening 12 seconds, one of the fastest goals in Nations League history.
Key Match Events: Bradley Barcola scored in the opening minute for France.
Federico Dimarco equalized for Italy with a volley.
Davide Frattesi put Italy ahead five minutes after the interval.
Giacomo Raspadori scored Italy's third goal in the 74th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Luciano Spalletti praised Sandro Tonali's performance, highlighting his contributions despite concerns about his fitness.
